comment.author: 92807080@N00
comment._content: I'll bet this man called himself a farrier rather than a blacksmith.

comment.author: 65579876@N03
comment._content:
Look at the calkins on the shoes! [the heels of the iron horsehoes] these were meant to give traction when hauling heavy loads, but could cause problems by throwing the foot off balance.
Great looking horse, though-I love the dapples.
